attributes.action: Create an official Government page honouring the fallen police officers who protect Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
In America, Police who have died in the line of duty are remembered with a website and their duties. In England, their names are just in a newspaper and forgotten. Those who serve and protect our streets deserves to be known as heroes as without their heroism, society may not be safe. An official Government website with our fallen is the least to
acknowledge how important the police are and their sacrificies to Britain.
